About me

I am a graduate student at department of electrical engineering at IIT Bombay. I work in HPC lab.

My area of research is partitioning of large scale systems. I also dribble in graph theory, linear algebra and functional programming languages. I have more than a layman interest in social anthropology.

I am perhaps the yougest Nehruvian alive. I have tremendous respect for Prof. Andre Beteille. I am greatly benefitted from his books.

I am active on a google-group Samwad. I post some of my thoughts on social situations there.
